Package game.general

Class Room

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.general.Room
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    K
    public class Room
extends Object
implements K
    This class represents one room. Every room has a unique ID and a room can have various attributes, such as a room description, connected doors, a monster, items, a treasure etc...

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private Door[] doors
      Stores an array of doors.
      private ArrayList<Item> items
      Stores the room's items.
      private Keyring keyring
      A room has its own keyring which can contain zero to many keys.
      private Monster monster
      Represents the monster in the room, if one exists.
      private static int roomCount
      Amount of rooms created.
      private String roomDesc
      Stores a room description.
      private int roomID
      A unique ID for the room
      private Treasure treasure
      Room's treasure.

    • Field Detail

      • roomCount

        private static int roomCount
        Amount of rooms created. Used to identify each room with a unique ID.

      • roomID

        private final int roomID
        A unique ID for the room

      • doors

        private final Door[] doors
        Stores an array of doors.

      • keyring

        private final Keyring keyring
        A room has its own keyring which can contain zero to many keys.

      • roomDesc

        private String roomDesc
        Stores a room description.

      • treasure

        private Treasure treasure
        Room's treasure. Expected to be null if there's no treasure in the room.

      • items

        private ArrayList<Item> items
        Stores the room's items.

      • monster

        private Monster monster
        Represents the monster in the room, if one exists.

            Keyring keyring,

        Parameters:
        roomDesc - A room description.
        doors - Doors connected to the room.
        keyring - Keyring for the room.
        treasure - The room's treasure.
        items - Items in the room.
        monster - A monster in the room.

      • generateRoomID

        private static int generateRoomID()
        Returns:
        A unique roomID

      • sortDoorsByDirection

        public void sortDoorsByDirection()
        Sorts the doors in the room according to their direction in a pre-determined order.

      • doBattle

        public boolean doBattle​(Player player,
                        Scanner scanner,
                        VisualEffectManager visualEffectManager)
                 throws Exception
        Starts a battle starts in the room.
        Parameters:
        player - The player of the game.
        scanner - A scanner used for user input.
        visualEffectManager - Used for visual effects i.e. clearing the console.
        Returns:
        true if player wins, otherwise false.
        Throws:
        Exception - If something goes wrong while clearing the console.
